I think that Mr Cheng tried his best to engage us in activities that encouraged us to speak in English but also was fun. However, some of the material is pretty outdated and stiff. Also Larps can get reallly messy sometimes.
LARP is a good way for oral training. Besides Larp, I would like to learn more strategies related to speech giving.
感謝教授讓我經過這堂課後口說能力有明顯的進步
